body_html: @apaszke Thanks for your example of building pytorch from source using pip. I just want to ask that, before python setup.py build_deps, should I install those optional dependencies as in Anaconda? I mean, conda install numpy pyyaml mkl setuptools cmake gcc cffi. Or python setup.py build_deps will take care of it? Thanks.
body_text: @apaszke Thanks for your example of building pytorch from source using pip. I just want to ask that,  before python setup.py build_deps, should I install those optional dependencies as in Anaconda? I mean, conda install numpy pyyaml mkl setuptools cmake gcc cffi. Or  python setup.py build_deps will take care of it? Thanks.
body: @apaszke Thanks for your example of building pytorch from source using pip. I just want to ask that,  before `python setup.py build_deps`, should I install those optional dependencies as in Anaconda? I mean, `conda install numpy pyyaml mkl setuptools cmake gcc cffi`. Or  `python setup.py build_deps` will take care of it? Thanks.
